name: Let's Go Jungle! Special
overview: Let's Go Jungle! Special is an on-rails arcade shooter, produced by Sega in 2008 as an update to Let's Go Jungle! Lost on the Island of Spice, released two years earlier. Players sit on a revolving seat with a large projection screen in front, and another in back, as they travel the jungle shooting giant insects and creatures. This version also serves as a spiritual sequel to The House of the Dead 4 Special.
